19 package com.webtrends.harness.component.cache
20 
21 import java.security.MessageDigest
22 
23 /**
24  * This is basically the default cache key that can be overridden by a custom class
25  * The default will take the key to MD5 string
26  */
27 class CacheKey(id:Int, key:String, useMD5:Boolean=true) {
28   val digest = MessageDigest.getInstance("MD5")
29 
30   override def toString() : String = {
31     if (useMD5) {
32       val text = "%d-%s".format(id, key)
33       digest.digest(text.getBytes).map("%02x".format(_)).mkString
34     } else {
35       key
36     }
37   }
38 }
